Class: Osiris

Osiris(language, runOnBrowser)

Transpiles Python code to JavaScript and handles code execution in a web worker.

Constructor

new Osiris(language, runOnBrowser)

Creates an instance of Osiris.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
language string The target language.
runOnBrowser boolean Indicates if the code should run on a browser.

Sets the code to transpile and performs the transpilation.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
code string The Python code to be transpiled.

Returns:
The result of the transpilation containing success status and generated code or errors.

object

runCode(appendToTerminal, timeout)

Runs the transpiled code in a web worker.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
appendToTerminal function Callback function to append output to the terminal.
timeout number Timeout value (not currently used , to be implemented).
